summary: All previously reported issues were addressed with appropriate fixes and no new blocking problems were introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: BigInt precision loss when formatting credits using Number()
previous_issues_status.notes: Now uses pure BigInt math via formatCreditsFromMicro, avoiding precision loss.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Payment created with empty baseUrl leading to invalid IPN callback URL
previous_issues_status.notes: Now validates baseUrl and exits early with an ephemeral error if missing.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Assumed payment.expiresAt is a Date and could throw for string/number
previous_issues_status.notes: Now normalizes expiresAt to a Date before formatting, preventing runtime errors when a string/number is returned.
